TITLE_CONTRACT.P: German Embassy in Sofia (Bulgaria); new construction of embassy offices building with exterior guardhouse

LOCATION.P: Place of delivery and execution: Frederic Joliot-Curie-Street 25, 1113 Sofia, Bulgaria

SHORT_CONTRACT_DESCRIPTION.P: The foreseen plot is property of the Federal Republic of Germany and measures 3 700 m2 in area, with the following parameters:
Building site area: 2 851 m2, Building typology: one-storey building (Guardhouse) and four-storey building (Chancery) alongside with detached one-storey garage and covered walkway;

Built-up area of the building site: A guardhouse (114 m2), a guardhouse passage area (30 m2), a built walkway to the visa-control area (60 m2), a built waste facility (11 m2), a garage for Embassy cars (153 m2) and the Chancery (588 m2);
The total dimensions are as follows:
— Built-up area of the property: 953 m2,
— Unbuilt area of the property: 1 898 m2,
— Gross floor area (GFA) of the Chancery and the guardhouse: 3 241 m2,
— Gross cubic capacity of the Chancery and the guardhouse: 12 420 m3,
— Net internal area (NIA), including elements of useable floor area, technical-function floor area and passage area: 2 460 m2.
Execution of the works: divided in 5 construction phases.

Application of the Foreign Safety Guidelines of the German Federal Government as a binding regulation of the project design, construction planning, supervision and management works and prioritising the thereby required project characteristics.

TOTAL_QUANTITY_OR_SCOPE.P: The client shall provide the functional performance specifications as the basis for calculations, which is binding document, provided to the selected bidders in the second phase of this tender procurement.

The awarding shall take place conform to procedural regulations corresponding VOB/A-VS. Part B + C of the VOB will not be applied. In reference to the scope of planning and construction services of the order, the fact of functional performance and the transnational award, the FIDIC Silver Book, EPC/Turnkey Projects shall provide the contractual basis.
The possibility of calling upon national courts is excluded; the contract parties agree to an arbitrator. (Dispute Adjudication Board).

OPTION_DESCRIPTION.P: In the event that no economically viable offers have been submitted, the tender can be withdrawn and a subsequent negotiation procedure with the participating bidders can take place.

DEPOSITS_GUARANTEES_REQUIRED.P: Performance security with the following structure: 5 % as contract performance guarantee and 5 % as performance bond for the duration of the Defects Notification Period (5 years).
The client accepts proposals for down payment, upon provision of securities. All percentages given refer to net contract amount.

MAIN_FINANCING_CONDITIONS.P: The contract is being awarded at a fixed overall price. In the case of awarding, payment shall be rendered in line with the progress of construction and planning.

Upon the submission of a tender (2nd Phase), the bidder is to provide a proposal for a payment plan. The overall performance (planning and construction services) are to be executed in line with the regulations on "guaranteed maximum pricing procedure" specified in the construction contract.

LEGAL_FORM.P: Jointly and severally liable with an authorised representative.

EXISTENCE_OTHER_PARTICULAR_CONDITIONS.P: The procedure and contract language is English (British English). Correspondence relevant to the contract must be sent in English.
In the case of awarding, evidence of the conclusion of a construction-operation liability insurance policy with the following minimum coverage sums must be provided.

The bidder shall be deemed to provide along with his application documents the interim declaration by his bank and/or insurance company – business branch within the European Community — for liability insurance coverage in case the bidder will awarded the contract.

ECONOMIC_OPERATORS_PERSONAL_SITUATION.P: The required information is to be provided in the scope of a self-declaration. The European Single Procurement Document (ESPD) form must be used for this. This form is available on the internet site www. ec.europa.eu/tools/espd/filter. The bidder shall be deemed to submit a hard-copy of the ESPD document to: Poststelle.hbafr@vbv.bwl.de
The European Single Procurement Document ESPD serves as preliminary evidence and replaces certificates from authorities and third parties, thereby reducing the efforts required of the bidder.
Prior to a contract award, all certificates and evidence are to be submitted in written form. Alternatively, the documents can also be provided to the client free of charge using the PQ — Database.

EAF_CAPACITY_INFORMATION.P: The following minimum requirements must be met:
— a minimum of 10 000 000 EUR in annual revenue over the last 3 years,
— average annual workforce size of at least 50 employees-proof for the last 3 years.

The required information is to be provided in the scope of a self-declaration. The European Single Procurement Document (ESPD) form must be used for this. This form is available on the internet site www. ec.europa.eu/tools/espd/filter (To be submitted in written form along with the participation request).

T_CAPACITY_INFORMATION.P: The information is to be provided in the scope of a self-declaration. The European Single Procurement Document (ESPD) form must be used for this. This form is available on the internet site www. ec.europa.eu/tools/espd/filter (To be submitted in written form with the participation request).
In addition to the information provided in the self-declaration, the participation request (1st phase) must include the following documents:
1) References of services provided as a general contractor:

a) At least 2 references from the last 5 completed financial years that are similar to the services to be awarded in terms of executed services, size and period of execution. Buildings with heightened quality and security standards created for a European company or a European government institution are preferred.

b) This must include at least 1 reference for a project with total construction costs of > 10 000 000,00 EUR carried out in a south-eastern European country as a general-contractor-design-and-build-service. Preferably in the Republic of Bulgaria.
2) References from planning / design services:
a) Execution planning for structural engineering: References from the considered planning / design office
b) Execution planning for technical building equipment: References from the considered planning / design office(s) for the planning services
c) Planning / design application services for an administration buildings in the Republic of Bulgaria, for an investor from abroad (out of Bulgaria)

For all references to be submitted in accordance with the requirements of 1 and 2, an exact description shall be provided referring the type and scope of the construction and planning / design services, project language, staff deployment, construction period, quality and security standards, photos and plan reproductions.
Each reference must include a contact person from the client along with a telephone number and e-mail address.
3) Technical staff
References and proof of qualification must be submitted for those individuals who will be responsible for the following areas:
a) Project management team;
b) Planning / design services – lead architect, structural engineer, mechanical and electrical engineer, fire engineer, acoustic engineer, cost consultant, health and safety engineer;
c) Construction management for structural engineering, technical building facilities, civil engineering, landscape planning;
d) construction management of technical trades / disciplines and construction quality control.
Key expert 1: Team Leader.
He/she will be appointed on full time basis till the end of construction.
Qualifications and skills:
— MSc degree in Civil Engineering or Architecture or a University degree in Civil Engineering or Architecture acquired on a completion of academic studies in a university institution;
— Project management skills;
— Excellent fluency in English language;
— Excellent computer literacy (both office suite and engineering software).
General professional experience:
— Preferably twenty (20) years, but minimum fifteen (15) years of general professional experience in the field of building construction of modernization and adaptations in buildings.
Specific professional experience:
— Previous experience as a Team Leader of a construction team in at least two (2) projects for constructions works of similar size both for complexity and value;
— Experience in FIDIC contracts is preferred and will be considered an asset;
— Experience in similar projects with heightened quality and security standards is preferred and will be considered an asset.
Key Expert 2: Lead Planning Engineer.
He/she will be appointed on full time basis till the end of construction.
Qualifications and skills:
— MSc degree in Civil Engineering or a University degree in Civil Engineering acquired on a completion of academic studies in a university institution;
— Possession of license for responsible designer in accordance with Bulgarian Law on Planning and Construction or similar provided by EU country;
— Excellent fluency in English language;
— Excellent computer literacy (both in Office suite and engineering software).
General professional experience:
— Preferably fifteen (15) years, but minimum ten (10) years of general professional experience in the field of building construction.
Specific professional experience:
— Previous experience in planning services, in at least three (3) projects of similar size both for complexity and value;
— Experience in similar projects with heightened quality and security standards is preferred and will be considered an asset.
Key Expert 3: Site Engineer.
He/she will be appointed on full time basis till the end of construction.
Qualifications and skills:
— MSc degree in Civil Engineering or a University degree in Civil Engineering acquired on a completion of academic studies in a university institution;
— Excellent fluency in English language;
— Excellent computer literacy (both in Office suite and engineering software).
General professional experience:
— Preferably fifteen (15) years, but minimum ten (10) years of general professional experience in the field of building construction.
Specific professional experience:
— Previous experience in coordinating all technical aspects of construction contracts, in at least three (3) projects of similar size both for complexity and value;
— Previous experience in organizing and overseeing on-site activities for projects of similar size both for complexity and value is preferred and will be considered an asset.
Non key experts:

The Contractor’s other professional staff shall include experts with adequate and relevant qualifications at University Degree level and appropriate and pertinent working experience for the specific roles for which they are proposed. In addition, a pool of experts is expected to be provided in order to support/complement all the activities of the key experts. Possession of relevant Bulgarian license for design/construction services or similar provided by EU country would be required, as applicable.

OPE_OBJECTIVE_CRITERIA.P: The selection is carried out on the basis of the declarations, informations, references and proof documents provided in the tender of the competitive bidding as follows:
— Reference projects for Design and Build services under FIDIC Silver Book (35 %),
— QMS for Quality Control of Works and supplementary list of QC procedures (15 %).

References of subcontractors for main construction trade
Experience with FIDIC EPC/turnkey contracts + GMP
Quality management and building approach and planning
